original_name: Harry and His Bucket Full of Dinosaurs
plot: In &"Harry and His Bucket Full of Dinosaurs,&" a young red-headed boy explores life-issues with a team of dinosaur friends. His Nana gave him a bucket full of toy dinosaurs that allows him to visit a special place called Dino World. Whether he wants to stay up late, keep a library book past its due date, take care of a baby bird, or it's something else, Harry can work it out in this imaginative land. His dinosaur friends are Taury, Trike, Pterence, Patsy, Sid and Steggy. Back at home, Harry is looked after by his mother and his Nana.   Written by  Agent0042
